PMD - Planar Multibody Dynamics Open-Source Software
====================================================

PMD is a Python library for dynamic analysis, which allows the construction of mechanical models and their numerical
simulation.

Il codice sorgente Ã¨ disponibile su [GitHub](https://github.com/GiacomoCangi/PMD).
